image.alt: Zeeshan Raheem Awan - Advocate High Court Pakistan

items.text: I am Zeeshan Raheem Awan, Advocate High Court Pakistan and Managing Partner at ZRA Law Associates, with extensive experience in civil, criminal, corporate, and constitutional litigation.

My legal practice focuses on providing strategic, result-oriented representation to individuals, corporations, overseas Pakistanis, and foreign investors, ensuring protection of legal rights and commercial interests.
Successfully handled 1,100+ cases including property disputes, land agreements, suits for declaration and cancellation, recovery matters, and specific performance cases.
Regularly represent clients before Civil Courts, District Courts, and the High Court, conducting cross-examinations and advancing persuasive legal arguments.
Advisory and representation in company formation, contract drafting and review, compliance, regulatory matters, and commercial disputes.
Handling matrimonial disputes, guardianship, succession, maintenance (Nafaqa), dower (Mehr), and inheritance matters with discretion and diligence.
Providing legal assistance to overseas Pakistanis and international clients in property, corporate, and litigation matters in Pakistan.

segments.strong: Zeeshan Raheem Awan, Advocate High Court Pakistan

segments.text: , provides comprehensive legal services across civil, criminal, corporate, family, and constitutional law. We are committed to delivering practical, strategic, and result-oriented legal solutions.

Our firm represents individuals, corporations, overseas Pakistanis, and foreign investors, offering trusted legal advisory and strong courtroom representation with a focus on professionalism, integrity, and client confidence.

cards.title: Civil & Property Law
cards.description: Representation in land and property disputes, sale and purchase agreements, cancellation of documents, recovery suits, specific performance cases, and all related civil litigation matters before competent courts.

cards.title: Criminal & Litigation Services
cards.description: Legal defense and prosecution in criminal matters including white-collar crimes, cheque dishonor cases, fraud, FIR matters, bail applications, and trial proceedings in criminal courts.

cards.title: Corporate & Legal Advisory
cards.description: Advisory services for company formation, contract drafting and review, compliance, regulatory matters, legal due diligence, and cross-border legal assistance for overseas Pakistanis and international clients.

We also offer cross-border legal services for overseas Pakistanis and foreign investors.

contact.availability: We are available for consultations regarding corporate, property, family, civil, criminal, and High Court matters.
